pros: Awesome place to work. The team is agile and quick with very little bureaucracy. Alex is an awesome Director and super down-to-earth, and will happily listen to your concerns and thoughts. Employees are highly valued, appreciated, and accepted. The team works really well together and communicates exceptionally well. The location is really central near Holborn station. The pay is pretty good too. Salaries are reviewed every summer and may also be raised in appreciation of excellent performance.
cons: Not much; it can get super busy near large campaigns but the work is fun and meaningful.
